# Resources

## Bookdown resources
Below are some key resources for to help you create a book using Bookdown.

1. [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/) by Yihui Xie, J. J. Allaire, Garrett Grolemund  
1. [bookdown: Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/) by Yihui Xie  
1. [GitHub Docs](https://docs.github.com/en) - See Get Started section  
1. https://bookdown.org/ - See example Bookdown courses
